member.summary: Provides functions to capture the entire screen, or a particular window, and save it to a file.

member.summary: Creates an Image object containing a screen shot of the entire desktop

member.param: The handle to the window. (In windows forms, this is obtained by the Handle property)

member.name: M:ScreenShotDemo.ScreenCapture.CaptureScreenToFile(System.String,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat)
member.summary: Captures a screen shot of the entire desktop, and saves it to a file
